entries.title: Prepping a GitHub Workshop for IEEE
entries.summary: Shared a new GitHub Pages project with our IEEE team and polished the site with a version counter and smarter banner updates.

entries.title: Dark Mode, Guestbook Experiments, and More Maintenance
entries.summary: Tried out a giscus-powered guestbook, refreshed visuals with Monokai dark mode, and kept learning about SaaS while planning future creative work.

entries.title: Why I'm Starting This Blog
entries.summary: Setting an intention to share daily notes on projects, lessons, and curiosities across engineering, art, and play.
